CmdLine: echo "http://dl-3.alpinelinux.org/alpine/edge/testing" >> /etc/apk/repositories;     echo "http://dl-3.alpinelinux.org/alpine/edge/community" >> /etc/apk/repositories;     apk add --update alpine-keys;     apk add bash automake make git rsync tar wget python py-setuptools        gcc g++ gfortran binutils libgcc libstdc++ libquadmath libgfortran        libdc1394 libdc1394-dev libraw1394 libraw1394-dev         readline readline-dev python-dev        motif-dev libxml2-dev libxml2 curl-dev curl freetds-dev dev86        py2-numpy openjdk8 openjdk8-jre-lib hdf5 hdf5-dev alpine-sdk        perl-test-harness valgrind py-pip ;     ln -sf /usr/lib/bcc/include/sys/cdefs.h /usr/include/sys/;     pip2 install nose tap tap.py;     wget -P /etc/apk/keys/ http://www.mdsplus.org/dist/mdsplus@mdsplus.org-589e05b6.rsa.pub;     echo "PACKAGER_PRIVKEY=\"/sign_keys/mdsplus@mdsplus.org-589e05b6.rsa\"\n" > abuild.conf
